object.name: UniqueGiftInfo
object.description: Describes a service message about a unique gift that was sent or received.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about a unique gift that was sent or received.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about a unique gift that was sent or received.

annotations.description: Origin of the gift. Currently, either 'upgrade' for gifts upgraded from regular gifts, 'transfer' for gifts transferred from other users or channels, 'resale' for gifts bought from other users, 'gifted_upgrade' for upgrades purchased after the gift was sent, or 'offer' for gifts bought or sold through gift purchase offers
annotations.html_description: Origin of the gift. Currently, either “upgrade” for gifts upgraded from regular gifts, “transfer” for gifts transferred from other users or channels, “resale” for gifts bought from other users, “gifted_upgrade” for upgrades purchased after the gift was sent, or “offer” for gifts bought or sold through gift purchase offers
annotations.rst_description: Origin of the gift. Currently, either 'upgrade' for gifts upgraded from regular gifts, 'transfer' for gifts transferred from other users or channels, 'resale' for gifts bought from other users, 'gifted_upgrade' for upgrades purchased after the gift was sent, or 'offer' for gifts bought or sold through gift purchase offers
annotations.name: origin

annotations.description: For gifts bought from other users, the currency in which the payment for the gift was done. Currently, one of 'XTR' for Telegram Stars or 'TON' for toncoins.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For gifts bought from other users, the currency in which the payment for the gift was done. Currently, one of “XTR” for Telegram Stars or “TON” for toncoins.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For gifts bought from other users, the currency in which the payment for the gift was done. Currently, one of 'XTR' for Telegram Stars or 'TON' for toncoins.
annotations.name: last_resale_currency

annotations.description: For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift in either Telegram Stars or nanotoncoins
annotations.html_description: Optional. For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift in either Telegram Stars or nanotoncoins
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift in either Telegram Stars or nanotoncoins
annotations.name: last_resale_amount

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.name: owned_gift_id

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.name: transfer_star_count

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.html_description: Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.name: next_transfer_date

annotations.description: For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For gifts bought from other users, the price paid for the gift
annotations.name: last_resale_star_count
